parameter.value: My name is Zaim. I have no idea of what it means.
I'm a former treasure seeker, but I gave up due to various reasons. Nowadays I sell furniture.
I love this city, it means alot to me. I have lived here since I was a little child.
I, as my father, sells furniture. I even make them myself.
Reasons for why I gave up the treasure seeking? I wasn't successful. All my life I've searched for the archdemons and their famous treasures.
I have never found them, but deep down inside me I know they exist. As the treasure seeker I was I used to read many ancient books. One caught my interest - it was about the godslayer.
The godslayer is said to be the most powerful weapon ever to have existed. I have read about it in the sealed section at the library.
The library is undoubtedly a very interesting source of information. I think I've read almost every book by now.
The sealed section at the library is only for members. Talk to Raspuita if you would like to become one. It's truly worth the subscription.
All my life I have searched for treasures, but I have never been really successful. My goal has always been the archdemons' ancient treasures.
My quest in life used to be to chase down the archdemons hideout. I actually believed myself to know where the entrance was, but it's just lies... everything is lies.
Well... I once thought that the secret entrance to the Archdemons hideout was the funny stone monument south-east of the city... but I never found anything special about the stones.
Some distant relative I have, who is buying my furniture I make. I don't like him, really.
Hello, |PLAYERNAME|. Feeling peckish for some furniture?
